value:
I wonder if anyone will appear in my
first dream of the year...$k$pProbably Lethe, right? Oh, but what
if it's Captain Ranulf!

Getting to wear such a pretty outfit is
like a dream come true. Now Lethe
and I can be kimono twins!
Urk... Rice cake...stuck...in throat!

I missed out on seeing the first
sunrise of the year, so I'm waiting
for the second. Want to join me?

So, this is a long-sleeved kimono,
huh? I gotta say, I love it! I wonder
if Captain Ranulf does too...

Hey there! New Year's greetings from
$Nf's castle!

New year, new me! But who's gonna
judge how much I've improved? Oh,
I know! Yoo-hoo, Captain Ranulf!
This year is going to be great!

Urk... I think I had a bit too much to
eat at the feast the other night. I think
I'm just gonna lie down for a bit...
Thanks a bunch!

Happy New Year! Getting to meet
me, the ever-so-lovely Lyre, means
your year's off to a pretty good start!

This has all been so amazing,
$Nu!$k$pI absolutely, positively, totally, and
completely, LOVE IT!$k$pThe New Year is always fun, but
celebrating it like this? I don't think
I've seen a single frown all day!$k$pI think we all need something like this
sometimes. Having to fight all the
time can get pretty exhausting.$k$pYou know what I mean, right? After
all, getting along is way better than
fighting. Everyone knows that!$k$pAnd now that the greetings are all out
of the way...it's time for the gifts!$k$pSo go on, cough 'em up!
えいっ
おめでと～！
きゃあっ
最っ悪ぅ～…
Here's to a great year!
Kimonos are so cute!
I want my New Year's gifts!
Hiss!
Save me, Captain Ranulf!
Heheheh.
Happy New Year! Let's celebrate!
Hey, what was that for?!
I wanted to get up early and watch the first sunrise of the year, but, uh, I kinda slept through it.
I've got my very own kimono! Not so special anymore, are you, Lethe? *laugh*
So what if I eat all this? I'm sure Kyza packs away just as much—if not more!
I bet Captain Ranulf's gonna give me a ton of New Year's money! Aaaaaany second now...
Spending the New Year with you is the most fun ever!
OK!
Whaaat? Me?
Oooh, is it my turn?
